metadata.title: CVE-2017-16804 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Redmine before 3.2.7 and 3.3.x before 3.3.4, the reminders function inapp/models/mailer.rb does not check whether an issue is visible, whichallows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information byreading e-mail reminder messages.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
